Flub.Name: Shrink
Flub.Description: Contraction of the fault from the two ends.

Flub.Name: Chaos
Flub.Description: The randomness of the features of the fault.

Flub.Name: X
Flub.Description: The horizontal position of the fault. Only available when Shrink is above 0.0.

Flub.Name: Y
Flub.Description: The vertical position of the fault.

Flub.Name: Seed
Flub.Description: The randomization pattern or seed for the node's process.
